sentences.en: But the conditions can be grueling.
Despite a grueling daily schedule of physiotherapy, the outlook remained bleak.
sentences.cn: 尽管每天都严格坚持物理治疗, 前景还是令人担忧.

sentences.en: Facing grueling employment competition, university graduates may produce all knids of psychologicai problems.
sentences.cn: 大学毕业生面对激烈的就业竞争, 容易产生各种心理问题.

sentences.en: For the next grueling year, I'll be your homeroom teacher.
sentences.cn: 在接下来辛苦的一年, 我将是你们的班主任.

sentences.en: Fox : I think it was more grueling on the crew.
sentences.cn: 影响最大的肯定是剧组人员了.

sentences.en: His grueling schedule is just one not - so - subtle hint of what he expects from employees.
sentences.cn: 他总是排得满满的日程,就不太隐晦地暗示出他对手下员工的期望.

sentences.en: I rode beside the stopped cars for mile after grueling mile.
sentences.cn: 我在停下来的车阵旁费力地骑过一英里又一英里.

sentences.en: Nursing school was grueling, especially for someone who'd never used a computer.
sentences.cn: 护理学校很苛刻, 尤其是对某些从来没用过电脑的人.

sentences.en: Over the next few months he underwent a grueling regimen of chemotherapy.
sentences.cn: 随后的几个月里,他经受了极度疲劳的化疗.

sentences.en: The Hawaii Ironman is even more grueling.
sentences.cn: 夏威夷铁人三项赛就更艰巨了.

sentences.en: The recruits were put through a week of grueling endurance tests.
sentences.cn: 新兵要接受为期一周艰苦的耐力测试。

sentences.en: The two confronted one another , and despite a grueling battle , Lah lost.
sentences.cn: 愤怒的拉决定向索洛姐弟复仇.

sentences.en: War was grueling and oppressive and frustrating and uncomfortable, but one had friends.
sentences.cn: 战争虽然严酷,暴虐, 富有破坏性,给人带来灾难,但它却使人从中得到知心朋友.

sentences.en: Was it as physically grueling to shoot those scenes as it appeared?
sentences.cn: 在拍摄那些打斗逃生场景的时候,是不是真的像演的那么混乱?

sentences.en: Yet he went on to win the Tour de France, one of the most grueling sports events there is, a record 7 times.
sentences.cn: 然而，他却在环法自行车赛获胜，并破了连续7次夺冠的记录，要知道，这可是最折磨人的一项体育项目啊。

sentences.en: You reach your goal after grueling hours of sweat and pain.
sentences.cn: 在不知流了多少汗、吃了多少苦后实现了目标.

words.tran_cn: 折磨人的；繁重累人的；使人精疲力尽的

trans.tran_cn: 紧张的，激烈的，使极度疲劳的

trans.tran_en: Gruel is a food made by boiling oats with water or milk
